/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage offering a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding life and movement to the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the vibrancy of city life.
